title: PytagoraZ
author: PytagoraZ
content: I see lots of mixer ads on this forum, like gambling ads. I think both of these things have something to do with bitcoin. But only gambling gets a special subboardIn my opinion, there needs to be more discussion about mixers because they are often associated with money laundering. To avoid any kind of mixer fraud, is it possible to have a dedicated board for mixer service? Whether it's dangerous or not if the mixer service has a dedicated board, maybe this forum will be accused of supporting mixer service

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: While there are hundreds of casino active in the gambling section, how many mixers are active here? Maybe 4/5 or a few more. Besides, they don't have huge community like casino has. I don't think it's necessary. How a dedicated board would help avoiding fraud mixer? You don't know who are scammer before they scam.Quote from: PytagoraZ on September 05, 2023, 04:37:58 AMWhether it's dangerous or not if the mixer service has a dedicated board, maybe this forum will be accused of supporting mixer serviceForum won't be accused of anything of course. Otherwise, theymos would prohibited posting mixer ANN here.You should know that theymos has rrequested the forum stuff to not promote mixers.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Mixer is associated with privacy, but there was an user propose to add cybersecurity and privacy board, but until now there's no movement about it. So I expect there's will be no dedicated board for mixer as long as the cybersecurity and privacy board not added yet.As long as the mixer pay or allow every user to withdraw their coins regardless of the purpose is, the mixer isn't scam or fraud.However if you still think mixer is associated with money laundering, read this thread Irrefutable evidence that mixers alone are unsuitable for money laundering!

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Your argument for mixer services board is weak, you might wanna elaborate more on that. And no, I don't think we need one as it wouldn't stop scams in any way and afterall there's not enough of them to warrant separate bioard.
